title: Evaluating state preparation algorithms for quantum circuits
content: The project will involve reading research papers on quantum state preparation, implementing them and evaluating them to identify which algorithms are most suitable for which kind of states. The focus will be on practically efficient algorithms that perform the best on NISQ devices.
author: Anurag Sharma
metadesc: The project will involve reading research papers on quantum state preparation, implementing them and evaluating them to identify which algorithms are most suitable for which kind of states. The focus will be on practically efficient algorithms that perform the best on NISQ devices.
slug: Evaluating state preparation algorithms for quantum circuits
